banner.titulo: Turn your bonus into real money
banner.desc: When a customer wants to nominate a song, you can top up with your bonus and collect the cash. That's how you turn credit into real income.

bienvenida.label: WELCOME BONUS
bienvenida.consejo: Use it to cover your own bids and try the platform at no cost
bienvenida.completaRegistro: Complete your registration to claim the bonus

historial.title: BONUS HISTORY
historial.empty: Top-up bonuses will appear here after your first top-up
